Eugene: this PDE code changed considerably in 3.4 so I don't have a way of determining whether this can still be a problem.  If you can reliably reproduce this on your Eclipse build please reopen.  Or, if you could point out the offending lines of source in the Eclipse version I can try to diagnose further or pass on to the PDE folks.
